name: RRP Compliance: WORKER STANDARD BUCKET
description: The RRP Worker Standard Bucket prepares you with everything you need for the job. The Worker Standard comes with everything found in the Worker Basic Bucket and upgrades you to include a reusable half mask with 4 replacement filters as well as a sprayer on a belt harness. 1x 3M Ultimate Reusable Half Mask Size Medium 4x Replacement filters for Reusable Half Mask 2x Micromax Breathable Disposable Coveralls 10x Tyveck Shoe/Boot covers 10x Nitrile Med Grade Dsble Gloves 6-Mil powder free 1x Duct Tape (60yrds) 1x Commercial Mist Bottle 1x 5 Gallon Bucket with lid 5x 3-MIL Contractors Garbage Bags (42Gal) 25x PURELL Sanitizing Hand Wipes

name: RRP Compliance: CERTIFIED WORKER BUCKET
description:
This is our most popular kit by far because it includes the bonus 8ct LeadCheck® Lead Testing Pack. So popular that we have added bonus expedited delivery. The Certified Renovator Bucket Kit is designed to ease the stress of chasing after products for each of your workers and allowing to worry about what's important. The job. Remember the simple rule of thumb, ONE BUCKET/ONE WORKER.

1x LeadCheck ® Instant Lead Testing (8 swab pack)
1x 3 X 200 Caution Tape
2x 3M™ Particulate Respirator 8233, N100 Disposable
2x Breathable Disposable Coveralls
10x Tyveck Shoe/Boot covers (200/case)
10x Nitrile Med Grade Dsble Gloves 6-Mil powder free
1x Safety Glasses
1x Duct Tape (60yrds)
1x Commercial Sprayer 
1x 5 Gallon Bucket with lid
5x 3-MIL Contractors Garbage Bags (42Gal)
25x PURELL Sanitizing Hand Wipes

name: RRP Compliance: WORKER BASIC BUCKET
description:
This job-ready kit prepares you with the basics needed for any job. All packaged in a convenient 5-gallon bucket.
2x 3M™ Particulate Respirator 8233, N100 Disposable
2x Micromax Breathable Disposable Coveralls
10x Tyveck Shoe/Boot covers (200/case)
10x Nitrile Med Grade Dsble Gloves 6-Mil powder free
1x Safety Glasses
1x Duct Tape (60yrds)
1x Commercial Mist Bottle (32oz)
1x 5 Gallon Bucket with lid
2x 3-MIL Contractors Garbage Bags (42Gal)
25x PURELL Sanitizing Hand Wipes
